title: Custom Select component
problem: Native <select> looks ugly; dark mode dropdown unreadable; no rounded corners on some platforms
done_when: All selects replaced with custom component; dark-mode readable; rounded corners visible

title: Remove Mods UI
problem: Mods list/modal is ugly and not needed
done_when: Mods button/modal removed; no mods UI shown anywhere

title: Modrinth modpack can start
problem: Installed Modrinth modpack (.mrpack) cannot start because it only unzips without installing loader/mods
done_when: Installing a Modrinth mrpack provisions Fabric server jar + downloads mods; Install & Start works for Fabric packs

title: CurseForge without env var setup
problem: CurseForge requires server env API key; users expect easier setup / direct install
done_when: Panel Settings supports entering API key; CurseForge search is disabled with clear CTA; direct URL install works without key

title: Simplify awkward flows
problem: Overall workflow feels weird; too much low-value info in UI

done_when: Theme/daemon dropdown menus fully visible and selectable everywhere

done_when: Games toolbar has clear primary action + compact secondary actions

title: Lock actions while busy

title: Backup button

title: Restore from backup
problem: Daemon has mc_restore but UI has no restore workflow

title: List backups
